h4.em: *We will continue to update this page as changes are announced*

a.span: Message from our Headmasters - Governor's Executive Order
Message to CMA Families from our Headmaster
Continuity of Learning & COVID-19 Response Plan
Example Schedule for an At Home Montessori Day

h4.span: Are you in need of support or resources? Please call 2-1-1 from any phone to be connected to a list of statewide resources.

a.span: Child Mind Institute - Support During COVID-19

div.p: Michigan Mental Health Warmline Resource: Michigan Department of Health and Human Services (MDHHS) is launching a statewide warmline for Michiganders living with persistent mental health conditions. The warmline will connect individuals with certified peer support specialists who have lived experiences of behavioral health issues, trauma or personal crises, and are trained to support and empower the callers. The warmline will operate seven days a week from 10 a.m. to 2 a.m. at 888-PEER-753 (888-733-7753). It is intended to serve individuals living with persistent mental health challenges including anxiety, depression and trauma. Individuals in crisis, including those considering suicide, are urged to contact the Disaster Distress Helpline 24/7 at 800-985-5990 or the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline 24/7 at 800-273-8255.
Creative Montessori Academy is a tuition-free kindergarten through eighth-grade Montessori public school, with tuition based preschool available.

div.div: © 2019 Creative Montessori Academy | Website by Revel
